title: pls gift me sona
body: I play support and everyone has been telling me to get sona. I have looked at her and she seems good and i was hoping someone would be kind enough to gift her to me.

replies.body: in classic mmo's it is looked down upon to beg in the streets. if you work hard you will make enough ip for runes and all the champs. use phone credit to buy things you "need" you'll get there. you can do it for free, people have to pay to gift you things.
It takes 2 days to get her if you are persistent
i would but i dont have RP
